remarks: An element of the base set of a finite free module with a Cartesian product as index set as operation value.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2019.)
statement:
frlmbas3.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod ( N X. M ) ) $.
frlmbas3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
frlmbas3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmbas3 $p |- ( ( ( R e. W /\ X e. V ) /\ ( N e. Fin /\ M e. Fin ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. M ) ) -> ( I X J ) e. B ) $.
